text: @realDonaldTrump @POTUS President Trump now I can feel your heroic energy returning you confronted D media perfectly.I believe you just need to get angry enough & U will find brilliant way to defeat covid19.I trust you & your team will beat covid19 you just have to turn into Hulk figuratively speaking.
